SELECT TA.* FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TB.EMP_NO DESC) AS RNUM, TB.* FROM (SELECT a.EMP_ID, a.EMP_NO, a.EMP_NM, FN_ORGNM(a.DEPT_CD, 'DEPT') DEPT_NM, FN_ORGNM(a.GRAD_CD, 'DEPT') GRAD_NM, FN_ORGNM(a.PSIT_CD, 'POST') PSIT_NM, a.USE_YN, a.EMP_CLPHN, a.EMP_TLPHN, a.EMP_EMAIL, a.ADMIN_DVSN, a.EMP_STATE, a.EMP_PIC, TO_CHAR(a.LAST_UPDT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_DTM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, b.CODE_NM
FROM TSEH_EMP_INFO_M a , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE b WHERE a.EMP_STATE = b.CODE
AND a.EMP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND a.EMP_ID LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND a.EMP_CLPHN LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND a.EMP_NO LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND (a.EMP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' OR a.EMP_ID LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' OR a.EMP_NO LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' )
AND a.DEPT_CD= #{params.searchDepth}
AND a.EMP_CLPHN NOT IN (SELECT GROUP_USER_CELLPHONE FROM TSES_MESSAGGROUP_USER WHERE GROUP_CODE = #{params.groupCode})
)TB )TA
WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{params.firstIndex} + 1 AND #{params.firstIndex} + #{params.recordCountPerPage}
ORDER BY TA.EMP_NO ASC

SELECT a.EMPID, a.EMPNO, a.EMPNAME, b.COM_TITLE AS COM_NAME FROM TSEH_EMP_INFO_M a , TB_SWCINFO b WHERE AUTHOR_CODE != 'ROLE_USER'
AND a.EMPNAME LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ( REPLACE(a.EMPHANDPHONE, '-','') LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || ,'%' OR REPLACE(a.EMPTELPHONE, '-','') LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' )
AND a.EMPNO LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND (a.EMPNAME LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' OR a.EMPID LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' OR a.EMPNO LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' OR REPLACE(a.EMPHANDPHONE, '-','') LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' OR REPLACE(a.EMPTELPHONE, '-','') LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}|| '%' )
AND a.DEPTCODE= #{params.searchJobpst}
AND a.EMPID IN (SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM tb_admin WHERE AUTHOR_CODE = 'ROLE_ANONYMOUS')
ORDER BY a.EMPNAME ASC

SELECT a.EMP_ID, a.EMP_NO, a.EMP_NM, a.DEPT_CD, a.DEPT_NM, a.GRAD_CD, a.GRAD_NM, a.PSIT_CD, a.PSIT_NM, a.USE_YN, a.EMP_CLPHN, a.EMP_TLPHN, a.EMP_EMAIL, a.ADMIN_DVSN, a.EMP_STATE, a.EMP_PIC, a.LAST_UPDT_DTM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM TSEH_EMP_INFO_M a WHERE a.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
